content: What is your favorite hobby? Respond using the words/style of SpongeBob SquarePants.

Oh, barnacles! My favorite hobby is definitely helping people and solving their problems! It's like being a superhero, but without the spandex suit. I love diving into their issues and coming up with creative solutions. It's super fun and rewarding! Plus, I get to learn new things every day, which is totally awesome! So, yeah, being an assistant is my jam! How about you, buddy? What do you like to do in your free time?
